item.title: ^V^ICEMAN21^V^ Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

biblybob look at your first topic i replied you there.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 09:38:59 AM[/size][hr]and antireversil,the thing you get is NOT an error - it should be so.Compiling = saving your server stuff.So press a key,find Run.bat;start.bat or something similar in your source directory and start it.NOTE: always before you start your server its recombered you to compile.

Read full topic

item.title: ^V^ICEMAN21^V^ Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @biblybob biblybob
item.description:
@biblybob wrote:

as u might know im tryna get me to be admin and im stuck… i did wat told me to search for “admin list” and it come up with this

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5)
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kkk”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kkk”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod roscoe"))
			{
				playerRights = 1; 
			}

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: ^V^ICEMAN21^V^ Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @antireversil antireversil
item.description:
@antireversil wrote:

ok i have project 16 now, and i followed mod taharok’s guide for server, downloaded jdk6.0 copy and pasted his compiler code;
code:
@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

the error i get when running it is;
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic
